thread.title: Fidelis Group Holdings, LLC Hires Darrin Huck as Vice President of Marine Division

author: cnbc.com
title: Fidelis Group Holdings, LLC Hires Darrin Huck as Vice President of Marine Division
text:
COVINGTON, La., Feb. 22, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Fidelis Group Holdings, LLC (FGH), with its subsidiary Continental Underwriters, Ltd., announced today the hiring of Mr. Darrin Huck as Vice President of its Marine Division. Mr. Huck will be a Senior Underwriter within the group's Brown Water Hull, Liabilities and Cargo product lines and will be based in their Houston, Texas office.
"We remain focused on investing in top talent to further bolster the company's leadership position in a market that is undergoing rapid changes. Darrin's extensive claims management and underwriting background will play an integral role in shaping the company's future. We welcome Darrin to the FGH family and look forward to our collective efforts to provide clients with unparalleled service and expertise," said H. Elder Brown Jr., Chairman of FGH.
Mr. Huck comes to FGH with over 30 years of experience in the marine industry, most recently as Vice President, Southwest Regional Manager of Starr Companies. Before joining Starr, he was with AIG, Sealand Service, Inc. and St. Paul Insurance Company, respectively. Additionally, he is a graduate of the U.S. Merchant Marine Academy, Kings Point, and serves on their Alumni Association.
Contact Information:
Darrin Huck: dhuck@cultd.com | 844.879.9686 ext. 149
About the Company:
Headquartered in Covington, Louisiana, Fidelis Group Holdings, LLC is a leading provider of primary, excess, ocean cargo, and inland marine insurance for hull and maritime liability coverages (P&I) for vessel owners, ship builders, terminal operators, fleet operators, stevedores, cargo handlers, marine contractors and a variety of other maritime insurance products. FGH provides underwriting, broker services, claims management and loss control assistance for its maritime clients. The Company's subsidiary, Continental Underwriters, Ltd., ( http://cultd.com/ ) also represents a number of highly rated marine insurers.
Media Contact: media@cultd.com

SOURCE Fidelis Group Holdings, LLC; Continental Underwriters, Ltd.
